Product Title: Hyaluronic Acid & Caffeine Eye Roller Serum for Men with Vitamin C – Made in USA – Depuffing Eye Roller Ball for Dark Circles & Puffiness – Mens Day & Night Anti-Aging Under Eye Serum Roller – 10ml (0.68 Fl Oz (Pack of 2))

Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Eye-Bag Depuffer', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Gentlehomme', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.68 x 1.14 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '850030774026', 'Manufacturer': 'Gentlehomme', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: The rolling ball feels nice and cool but it seems like hardly any product comes out unless it soaks in that fast.  It did nothing for the undereye, better for the under brow bone.  Maybe brightens but it doesn't seem to moisturize.

reference_summary:
e.l.f. Cosmetics All Over Color Stick - Pink Lemonade
e.l.f.
['New Instantly Brightens Eyes, Lips and Face Naturally Illuminates for a Healthy Glow Instantly Soothes & Conditions Skin Multi-Purpose Formula Safe, Gentle Formula Instantly beautiful, healthy-looking skin designed, formulated and tested by our professional team of makeup artists.']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 3 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'Date First Available': 'May 14, 2009', 'Manufacturer': 'E.L.F. Cosmetics'}
This is a pretty color but I bought this blush based on the ingredients shown in the picture on the back of the package which have a low toxic rating. HOWEVER the product I received has a different ingredient list that includes BHA which according to the Skin Deep website is a Human endocrine disruptor - strong evidence. As well as petrolatum classified as expected to be toxic or harmful  This also has proplyparaben a Human immune toxicant or allergen - strong evidence.  So I'm not sure I should use it which is a waste of money.  It rates an overall moderate toxic level according to EWG.
Moderately Toxic
Jade Rose Quartz Roller for Face 2 in 1 Gua Sha Set Including Rose Quartz Roller and Jade Face Massager 100% Real Natural Jade Facial Roller Anti Aging Face Roller Massager by Rayfarmo
RAYFARMO
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 7.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '680727935887', 'Manufacturer': 'RAYFARMO'}
I like the cool feel of the stone on my face.  The small end of the roller gives a nice light massage.  The extra stone piece is nice for other areas like the arms and such.  The roller is smooth.  The extra stone piece can really work tension out.
Massaging
ZWIFEJIANQ Silicone Back Scrubber,Exfoliating Lengthen Silicone Bath Body Brush for Men and Women,Deep Clean & Invigorate Your Skin (30 inch, Purple)
ZWIFEJIANQ
{'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 4.57 x 1.93 inches; 7.37 Ounces', 'UPC': '781076826120'}
Works well to scrub your back and sholders.  The hook it comes with was not that great.
Scrubs without Scratching
KPOKPO 2021 NEW - Soft Shower Body Brush ，Back Scrubber Soft Bristles Bath Brush， 3 in 1 Foldable Bath Brush Exfoliating Brush with Long Handle Body Brush Lotion Applicator and Massager
KPOKPO
{'Material': 'Sponge,Plastic,Nylon', 'Brand': 'KPOKPO', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '19.18 x 3.14 x 0.82 inches', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Nourishing,Clean,Exfoliating', 'Operation Mode': 'Manual', 'Product Dimensions': '19.18 x 3.14 x 0.82 inches; 13.44 Ounces', 'UPC': '712491891110', 'Manufacturer': 'ProOrganic'}
This is great.  It has a curve so you can reach the curves of your back.  The britsles are soft.  The sponge is great.  It folds up for travel.  The handle is solid and sturdy.  Just be careful when changing the head piece, I pinched the skin on my finger.
Love it
Long-Handled Back Scrubber for Shower Body-Brush - HFLHLL Super Long Portable Assembly 3 in 1 Bath Exfoliating Brush with Bristles Sponge Massager Head, Suitable for Wet or Dry, Women and Men
HFLHLL
{'Brand': 'HFLHLL', 'Power Source': 'hand_powered', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Wash with Warm Water', 'Operation Mode': 'Manual', 'Package Dimensions': '13.74 x 4.72 x 2.99 inches; 15.91 Ounces', 'UPC': '730869806597', 'Manufacturer': 'HFLHLL GROUP'}
The attachments are great.  Thick sponge and soft brush.  One of the best I have tried.  The only negative is releasing the attachment once it is on and you want to use a different attachement.  It's a bit difficult.
Great
VOKEYLA Blonde Short Wavy Wig with Bangs 12 Inch Shoulder Length Synthetic Cosplay Wig for Women None Lace Honey Blonde with Highlight Purple&Pink Stripe Pastel Wig(Blonde/Purple&Pink)
VOKEYLA
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '12 x 6 x 3 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'VOKEYLA', 'Product Dimensions': '12 x 6 x 3 inches; 11.22 Ounces'}
Cute wig for fun.  If you have thick hair though, it just barely fits.  I would have to shave my head.
Cute

Gentlehomme

The rolling ball feels nice and cool but it seems like hardly any product comes out unless it soaks in that fast.  It did nothing for the undereye, better for the under brow bone.  Maybe brightens but it doesn't seem to moisturize.
Not Much

- **Cosmetic Preferences:** The user continues to favor multi-purpose beauty products that enhance natural beauty and promote a healthy glow. Their recent purchase of a synthetic wig highlights their playful embrace of transformative beauty, enjoying fun self-expression through diverse cosmetics.

- **Ingredient Awareness:** The user remains devoted to low-toxicity formulations and maintains a vigilant approach to ingredient safety. Their recent experience with an eye serum indicates a careful evaluation of product efficacy and respect for safe, impactful ingredients.

- **Skepticism of Brands:** The user upholds a critical stance towards brands lacking transparency in ingredient sourcing. They consistently scrutinize product claims, favoring reputable brands with integrity, especially in light of recent unsatisfactory experiences that emphasize their demand for quality and effectiveness.

- **Experience with Toxicity Ratings:** The user regularly references reliable sources for product safety, underscoring their commitment to informed decision-making focused on ingredient integrity and safety.

- **Overall Sentiment:** Despite a recent disappointment with an underperforming product, the user remains satisfied with products that align with their safety standards while incorporating enjoyable elements of beauty. Their approach balances effective, safe, and aesthetically pleasing items with conscientious consumption values.

In summary, the user exhibits a diligent attitude toward beauty and self-care, blending playful aspects with a rigorous commitment to product safety, efficacy, and integrity.
